articles.title: Kim Jong Un Meets CPC Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Meets CPC Delegation 
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC), met the visiting delegation of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China on Thursday. 
					 Present there were members of the Chinese delegation led by its Head Wang Jiarui and Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai. 
					
					 Also present there were Vice-premier of the Cabinet Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK; Kim Yang Gon, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and Kim Song Nam, vice department director of the C.C., the  WPK. 
					
					 At the meeting Wang Jiarui conveyed greetings from the collective leadership of the CPC including General Secretary Hu Jintao. 
					
					 He expressed deep condolences on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il, a close friend and teacher of the Chinese people. He said Kim Jong Il rendered great services for the Korean revolution and the development of friendly relations between China and the DPRK. 
					
					 Noting that under the leadership of First Secretary Kim Jong Un the Korean people have achieved fresh and great successes in socialist construction, Wang said that the Chinese party and people are sincerely rejoiced over them. 
					
					 It is the steadfast policy of the Chinese party and government to consolidate and develop the traditional Sino-DPRK friendly relations forged and developed by leaders of the elder generations of the two parties and two countries, he said. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the Sino-DPRK friendship would bloom more beautifully and yield rich fruits. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed thanks for this and asked him to convey his regards to the collective leadership of the CPC including General Secretary Hu Jintao. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un had a cordial and friendly talk with Wang Jiarui. 
					
					 He received a gift from the Chinese delegation. 
					
					 He hosted a dinner in honor of the Chinese guests. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were the members of the delegation led by Wang and Ambassador Liu Hongcai and staff members of the Chinese embassy here. 
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army; Jang Song Thaek, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC; Vice-premier Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee; Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon and Mun Kyong Dok, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the  WPK; and Kim Pyong Ho, Kim Song Nam and Ri Su Yong, vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK. 
					
					 The dinner proceeded in an amicable atmosphere.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulations from President of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulations from President of Democratic Congo 
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of the Democratic Republic of Congo, on July 24.
					 The message reads:
					
					 I, on behalf of the people of the Democratic Republic of Congo and on my own behalf, extend the warmest congratulations to Your Excellency on your receiving of the title of DPRK Marshal and on the celebration of the 59th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War in your country.
					
					 Availing myself of this happy opportunity, I affirm to you my will to boost the friendship and solidarity between the two countries for the happiness of the two peoples.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Goodluck Ebele Jonathan, president of Nigeria, on July 30.
					 The message said:
					
					 I received with pleasure the news that Your Excellency received the title of DPRK Marshal on July 17, 2012.
					
					 Availing myself of this significant opportunity, I, on behalf of the Nigerian government and people and my family, extend congratulations to Your Excellency.
					
					 We hope Your Excellency would wisely lead the DPRK amid support of your people.
					
					 Please accept our invariable friendly feelings and tribute.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Macedonian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Macedonian President 
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Dr. Gjorgje Ivanov, president of Macedonia, on its national day.
					 Kim wished the president success in the work for the development and prosperity of Macedonia.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Macedonian FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Macedonian FM
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, DPRK foreign minister, Thursday sent a message of greeting to his Macedonian counterpart Nikola Poposki on the national day of Macedonia.
					 The message hopes that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would continue to develop.

articles.title: Chinese Party Delegation Lays Wreath before Friendship Tower
articles.content:
Chinese Party Delegation Lays Wreath before Friendship Tower
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China led by its Head Wang Jiarui laid a wreath before the Friendship Tower on Thursday.
					 Present there were Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, and Guan Huabing, minister of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 A wreath was placed before the tower in the name of the delegation.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence to the memory of the fallen fighters of the Chinese People' Volunteers who bravely fought on the Korean front against the U.S. imperialists' invasion, before looking round the tower.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Sojourns in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Sojourns in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China led by its Head Wang Jiarui visited the Exhibition of Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army on Thursday.
					 The guests laid a floral basket before the statue of leader Kim Jong Il at the exhibition in the name of the delegation and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Being briefed on the immortal exploits the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu performed in establishing and developing the powerful defense industry of the country, they looked round with keen interest various types of weapons and combat and technical equipment produced at munitions factories of the DPRK and the open-air exhibition ground.
					
					 Wang wrote in the visitor's book: We pay tribute to the KPA which has preserved the glorious revolutionary tradition and firmly defended peace.
					
					 The Chinese delegation also visited the Pyongyang Children's Department Store and other places and apartment houses in Changjon Street.

articles.title: Om Yun Chol, Another Olympic Gold Medalist of DPRK
articles.content:
Om Yun Chol, Another Olympic Gold Medalist of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK athletes' successes at the London Olympics have come under spotlight of world's media.
					 Among the athletes is Om Yun Chol, who won gold medal in the men's 56 kg category of weightlifting.
					
					 "Black Horse" Om from group B overpowered group A rivals by applying "group-change tactics".
					
					 After the match, he told foreign reporters that the secret is nothing but the loving care of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Om belongs to the Amnokgang Sports Team.
					
					 The athletes and coaches of the team and other people in the DPRK are now rejoicing over his good job. They were unanimous in saying that his success showed the faith, grit and the mettle of the Korean army and people who are building a thriving country under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifter Wins Olympic Gold Medal in Women's 69kg: Xinhua
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifter Wins Olympic Gold Medal in Women's 69kg: Xinhua 
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Rim Jong Sim from the Democratic People's Republic of Korea won a gold medal by lifting a total of 261kg in the women's 69kg category at London Olympics on Wednesday, according to a Xinhua report.
					 The report said:
					
					 The snatch session was intense which saw three lifters, including Rim, succeed at 115kg. But in clean-and-jerk session, Rim easily took the lead with her first attempt of 142kg. She then extended her winning margin by jerking 146kg on her final attempt, giving her a total of 261kg. 
					
					 "The only thing I want to do right now is to run to our dear General with my gold medal in my hand," Rim said.
					
					Rim's gold medal marks her country's third win in weightlifting, previously in the men's 56kg and 62kg categories.
					
					 Speaking on the secret leading to her victory, she said, 
					
					 "Our training is designed to maximize our talents and combine them with precise movement.
					
					 Even when the training was really tough, as an athlete I have the duty to give joy to the supreme leader Kim Jong Un. This was my motivation and helps me to exert extra power. That's how I succeed."

articles.title: DPRK Wins Three Weightlifting Olympic Golds
articles.content:
DPRK Wins Three Weightlifting Gold Medals in Olympic Games
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Rim Jong Sim, a weightlifter of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, snatched a gold medal in women's 69kg category at London Olympics Wednesday, bringing the DPRK its fourth gold medal.
					 The news has sent another pleasure to the local people.
					
					 Kim Chang Bom, a citizen living in Moranbong District, Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					 "I felt refreshed to see the successful performance of DPRK weightlifters on TV. It was so ridiculous for Western media to guess that the DPRK would snatch only one silver medal at the London Olympiad.
					
					 The DPRK athletes have demonstrated the spirit of the Koreans in the current games."
					
					 Jong Chol Guk, a Pyongyang citizen, said:
					
					 "I was very excited to hear the news that Rim won a gold medal in women's weightlifting.
					
					 I feel high pride and honor of the Korean nation whenever seeing the DPRK flag being raised in international tournaments."
					
					 Kim Il Jin, a teacher at the Songyo District Juvenile Sports School, said:
					
					 "All of the teachers and students of the school are greatly inspired by the Olympic results of the DPRK athletes.
					
					 I will work harder to train reserve athletes who will glorify the honor of the country as they did."

articles.title: DPRK Sportspersons Prove Successful at Olympiads
articles.content:
DPRK Sportspersons Prove Successful at Olympic Games
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Athletes of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have bagged four gold medals at London Olympics as of Aug. 1. 
					 Among them are judoist An Kum Ae and weightlifters Om Yun Chol, Kim Un Guk and Rim Jong Sim.
					
					 Their admirable results remind the Korean people of those who won gold medals in the previous Olympic Games.
					
					 The DPRK has attended Olympic Games from the 20th Summer Olympiad.
					
					 In that Olympiad, Ri Ho Jun set a new world record by scoring 599 points out of 600 in the small-bore rifle shooting.
					
					 Boxer Ku Yong Jo defeated a U.S. rival in the finals at the 21st Olympiad.
					
					 In the 25th Olympiad, Pae Kil Su rose to a star in vaulting horse event and Kim Il and Ri Hak Son won gold medals respectively in the men's 48kg and 52kg categories freestyle wrestling. And Choe Chol Su took the men's 51kg category boxing title.
					
					 In the 26th Olympiad a 16-year-old girl Kye Sun Hui won a women's judo gold by beating down a Japanese rival while wrestler Kim Il bagged second Olympic gold.
					
					 Hong Un Jong came first in the women's long horse event and Pak Hyon Suk in the women's 63kg category weightlifting in the 29th Olympiad.

articles.title: Rim Jong Sim, Fourth Gold Medalist of DPRK in London Olympics
articles.content:
Rim Jong Sim, Fourth Gold Medalist of DPRK in London Olympics
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Rim Jong Sim, a weightlifter of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, won the women's 69 kg category at the London Olympic Games on Wednesday, bringing the DPRK the fourth gold medal.
					 She succeeded in lifting 115 kg in snatch and 146 kg in clean-and-jerk, 261 kg in total.
					
					 After the competition, she told reporters that the only thing she wanted to do right now is to run to respected Marshal Kim Jong Un with her gold medal in her hand.
					
					 The 2009-Year World's Ranking, released by the International Weightlifting Federation, listed Rim as a star in her teens. 
					
					 Belonging to the Kigwancha Sports Team, she took three gold medals in women's 48 kg category in the Sports Contest for Mangyongdae Prize held in 2008.
					
					 She bagged three silver medals in the First World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships in 2009 and a gold medal in the 2011 World Junior Weightlifting Championships.
					
					 Now she became an Olympic gold medalist.
					
					 The good results of the DPRK athletes at the London Olympics display the inexhaustible strength of Songun (military-first) Korea.

articles.title: Local Factories of DPRK Run on Normal Basis
articles.content:
Local Factories of DPRK Run on Normal Basis
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Local factories in Jagang Province, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are keeping their operation at full capacity through a technical improvement drive.
					 Usi County stands in the van of the provincial modernization drive. The county has successfully streamlined and computerized the production processes at various industrial establishments, including foodstuff factory, chemical and earthenware factories and paper mill.
					
					 Manpho City and Tongsin County finished updating their foodstuff, drinks and chemical factories.
					
					 The Chosan Wine Factory has built a pit depot with capacity of several hundred tonnes to ensure production of quality wine.
					
					 The industrial factories in Hwaphyong County have directed big efforts to raising the quality of their products.
					
					 The Kanggye Essential Foodstuff Factory, Janggang Drinks Factory and Huichon Daily Necessities Production Cooperative secured abundant raw materials necessary for keeping production going on a normal basis.
					
					 Pak Myong Gil, chief engineer of the Usi Foodstuff Factory, told KCNA that he would do his best for the improvement of people's livelihood, true to the noble intention of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, who cares so much for the people's wellbeing.

articles.title: 2nd Rason International Trade Fair to Be Held
articles.content:
2nd Rason International Trade Fair to Be Held
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The 2nd Rason International Trade Fair is to be held in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Aug. 20-23.
					 Exhibited at it will be machinery, electric and electronic products, vehicles, consumer goods, medicines and other products of companies of various countries and regions, including the DPRK, China, Russia, France, Switzerland, Australia, the Czech Republic and China's Taipei.
					
					 The fair will be conducive to promoting cooperation and exchange among countries and regions in trade, economy and science and technology.
					
					 The program of the trade fair also includes investment-related explanation sessions and consultations and participants' visit to industrial establishments in the Rason Economic and Trade Zone, according to Kim Sun Hui, a section chief of the Rason Exhibition Corporation.
					
					 The 1st Trade Fair took place in August Juche 100 (2011).

articles.title: National Symposium on Medicine Held
articles.content:
National Symposium on Medicine Held 
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- A national symposium on medicine took place at the Grand People's Study House here on Thursday on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the publication of President    Kim Il Sung's work "On Improving Public Health Service".
					 The President clarified the importance of the public health service in the concluding speech made at the 37th session of the People's Committee of north Korea on May 21, 1947 and indicated practical tasks and ways.
					
					 Health workers here were present there.
					
					 Drawing the attention of the participants were papers presented by Choe Yong Il, doctor at Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Kwang Bok, researcher at Kim Man Yu Hospital, Kwon Yong Gun and Jong Kwang Il, doctors at the hospital, and Choe Sun Bom, doctor at the Central Hygienic and Anti-Epidemic Center under the Ministry of Public Health.
					
					 Also appreciated were papers on successes made in the researches into increasing the effect in the treatment by putting hygienic information service and treatment of high blood pressure and other troubles on a scientific basis to suit their specific conditions.
					
					 Among those papers were the ones helpful to solving scientific and technological issues arising on diagnosis for first aid treatment and the system for a differential diagnosis and the preventive treatment of a stroke and virus-related diseases.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dynamic Movement for Production of August 3 Consumer Goods
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dynamic Movement for Production of August 3 Consumer Goods 
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il kindled a torch for the August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement in 1984, wisely leading their production as a mass movement.
					 The movement plays an important role in developing the light industry and satisfactorily meeting the increasing public demand for those goods.
					
					This movement is advantageous in that it helps make the most effective use of idle workforce, materials and resources without big state investment for markedly increasing both varieties and quantity of consumer goods and thus meet the steadily growing public need for them.
					
					 An editorial of Rodong Sinmun Thursday calls upon all the officials and other working people to wage a dynamic campaign for producing August 3 consumer goods with the will to thoroughly implement the last instructions of Kim Jong Il who dedicated all his life to significantly improving the people's living standard. It goes on:
					
					  It is necessary to launch a drive to boost the production of quality consumer goods with ardent patriotism.
					
					 It is essential to produce even a single thing in best quality and turn out everything to be liked by people.
					
					 It is necessary to increase the production of quality grass, fiber, plastic goods and ornaments required by people.
					
					  Let us produce August 3 consumer goods in a nation-wide movement to supply more and better quality consumer goods for the people, concludes the editorial.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits in Party Building Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits in Party Building Praised
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined article deals with the exploits performed by leader Kim Jong Il in party building. 
					 On August 2, 1974 Kim Jong Il published work "Let Us Accelerate Modeling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism by Fundamentally Improving Party Work".
					
					 He in this work comprehensively clarifies the fundamental principles and ways for party construction and activities for developing the Workers' Party of Korea into the eternal party of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 His policy for modeling the whole party on Kimilsungism brought about a new milestone in the WPK's history and a radical change in the party building and activities, the paper notes, and goes on:
					
					 The validity and vitality of the policy were more strikingly demonstrated in the difficult period of the last decade.
					
					 Weathering the stern tempest of history, the WPK has remained boundlessly loyal to the leader's idea and cause. It demonstrated before the world that it is a party full of revolutionary mettle and strong in the sense of organization and discipline and that it is an invincible force guiding the people to victory and prosperity, being responsible for the destiny of the country and the nation to the last, despite whatever difficulties and trials.
					
					 Under the banner of modeling the whole party on Kimilsungism the WPK has grown to be revolutionary party firmly based on the ideological system and leadership system of the leader and an organizer and guide of all the victories of the Korean people.
					
					 The WPK will always shine as the great party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il thanks to the leader's theory and wealth of experience in party building enriched by Kim Jong Il and the guidance of the Central Committee of the Party which has creditably carried them forward.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Publication of Kim Il Sung's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Publication of Kim Il Sung's Work 
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday dedicates a bylined article to the 21st anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Achieve the Great Unity of Our Nation".
					 The President in his work made public on August 1, 1991 clarified the idea and theory on the great national unity including the issue of achieving the unity of the entire nation on the basis of patriotism and spirit of national independence, the issue of placing the nation's common interests above all matters and subordinating everything to national reunification, etc.
					
					 The work also comprehensively deals with fundamental principles, tasks and ways for achieving great national unity.
					
					 The article says:
					
					 All the patriotic forces in the north, south and abroad desirous of independent reunification should unite close and act as a united force to resolutely meet the blatant challenge of the separatist forces at home and abroad at present. This presents itself as a more urgent requirement than before.
					
					 The desperate moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad have driven the inter-Korean relations to such phase where they are beyond repair and put peace on the Korean Peninsula and the security of the Korean nation at grave peril.
					
					 The on-going developments teach a historic lesson to all the compatriots that the great national unity can be achieved only through a resolute struggle against the foreign aggression forces and their cat's paws, the group of traitors to the nation.
					
					 All the Koreans should turn out as one in a nation-wide struggle to fling open the gate to national reunification by concerted efforts true to the noble patriotic will and behests of the peerlessly great persons

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. Not to Forget Lesson Taught by Its Defeat in Korean War
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. Not to Forget Lesson Taught by Its Defeat in Korean War
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- 59 years have passed since the ceasefire in Korea, but the U.S. seems to have forgotten why it sustained such a shameful defeat in the last Korean War, says  Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined article.
					 The U.S. imperialists' invasion of the DPRK was the first war against the socialist country after the end of World War II, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Korean People's Army was born as a regular army just two years back. However, it had to fight the numerically stronger U.S. forces which boasted of being "the strongest" in the world.
					
					 They employed the most savage and barbarous methods in the world history of wars to bring the Korean people to their knees.
					
					 With neither methods nor means the U.S. imperialists could subdue the Korean people all out in their cause of justice. 
					
					 The arrogance of the American empire was humbled and suffered a shameless debacle in the Korean War.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised not to forget the lesson that victory in the fight between justice and injustice and in the confrontation between peace champions and aggressors is in store for the people who struggle for the cause of justice and the aggressors are fated to suffer a shameful fiasco. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialist warmongers, however, have never dropped their scenario to invade the DPRK.
					
					 Owing to their reckless war moves a touch-and-go situation prevails on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 It is a daydream of the U.S. imperialists to seize the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 They should not forget the above-said lesson. This is a solemn warning of the army and people of the DPRK to the U.S. warmongers.

articles.title: S. Korea's Moves to Tighten Military Nexus with Japan Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Moves to Tighten Military Nexus with Japan Assailed 
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- South Korea's moves to tighten the military nexus with Japan come under fire by bylined commentaries of papers here Thursday.
					 The Lee Myung Bak group rushed the GSOMIA through "a Cabinet meeting" behind closed doors only to trigger off strong domestic and foreign criticism and popular resistance. It was, therefore, compelled to declare that its signing would be put off. It is now busy running the whole gamut of absurd pretexts, claiming it was to "cope with the threat of the north's nukes and missiles" and "the agreement was good in its contents but there were only procedural matters." 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun observes in this regard:
					
					 What the Lee group is doing represents the treachery of the pro-Japanese lackeys in the 21st century as it was nothing but a revelation of its black-hearted intention to calm down the angry south Koreans and ink the agreement at any cost, watching for a chance. 
					
					 Any military nexus with foreign forces amounts to a grave challenge and an act of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 Japan's ambition to stage a comeback to Korea has gone beyond the tolerance limit since Lee came to power.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists invaded Korea under the plea of "rescuing" Japanese residents a century ago. Japan seeks to repeat the same crime under the same pretext.
					
					 The Lee group is set to conclude the agreement with the Japanese reactionaries keen to reinvade Korea, shamelessly justifying its history of colonial domination woven with all sorts of unethical crimes and working hard to grab Tok Islets. This treachery is little short of paving the way for Japan's comeback to Korea. 
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the south Korean regime's moves are being pushed forward as part of the scenario for knocking into shape the "triangular military alliance" aimed at invading the north under the backstage manipulation of the U.S. 
					
					 If Lee and the "Saenuri Party", the most faithful  pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese lackeys, are allowed to sign the agreement, it will be clear that the Korean Peninsula is bound to turn into a theatre of scramble for influence among foreign forces and the Korean nation will fall victim to them just as what happened early in the 20th century.
					
					 The conclusion of the agreement should be cancelled at once.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all fellow countrymen to turn out as one in the struggle to wipe out the pro-Japanese lackeys keen to hurt the dignity of the nation and turn the peninsula into a war theater of foreign forces.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. and S. Korea's Attempted Politically-Motivated Terrorism
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. and S. Korea's Attempted Politically-Motivated Terrorism
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- It was fully disclosed that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime attempted shocking politically-motivated terrorism to demolish statues symbolic of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its grand monuments.
					 This bespeaks that the anti-DPRK campaign of hostile forces is on the verge of total fiasco.
					
					 Much upset by the condemnation by the service personnel and people of the DPRK and worldwide criticism, the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors are busy with their moves to put the situation under control, but this is just like crying over spilt milk.
					
					 They are busy claiming that the much publicized case was "groundless," adding there were neither institution that sponsored terrorism nor persons involved in it. Their rhetoric to hide it is, however, only adding to their crimes.
					
					 The recent case was the most vivid expression of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK. They assert that they have neither hostile intent nor will to invade the DPRK, but the hostile policy remains invariable as "national policy" of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. evermore desperate moves against the DPRK have reached such an extreme and reckless phase that it is busy sponsoring and encouraging such terrorism.
					
					 It is nobody's secret that the U.S. has steadily pushed forward heinous terror operation and psychological warfare to bring down the social system of the DPRK behind the facade of the February 29 agreement for improving the DPRK-U.S. relations. 
					
					 The U.S. worked out a scenario for the above-said terrorism and set in motion its running dogs the Lee Myung Bak group to carry it out.
					
					 Its objective was to destabilize the people's mindset and do harm to their single-minded unity and thus bring down the DPRK social system in the end.
					
					 The U.S.-led imperialists were known to have rallied hostile elements and human scum for destabilization operations against Libya and other countries. The U.S. and its south Korean lackeys were so foolish as to use the same method against the DPRK. 
					
					 While working hard to create social chaos, the U.S. is busy amassing forces of aggression in south Korea and its vicinity, talking about provision of "extended nuclear deterrent" to the Lee group. The U.S. and the Lee group were hell-bent on an anti-DPRK smear campaign, crying out for the dismantlement of nuclear program of the DPRK and stop to its missile launches at various international arenas including the ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum.
					
					 All facts eloquently prove that the U.S. does not have even an iota of willingness to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Availing itself of the recent cases, the DPRK has roundly exposed the U.S. unpardonable scenario for aggression in the eyes of the world. The trend of the present times requires the U.S. to make a switchover in its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The International Herald Tribune recently reported that U.S. experts on Korean affairs jointly contributed an article titled "Peace first".
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to think twice about the assertion of its media that it can save its face only when it repents of what fatal consequences were entailed by its hostile policy based on a wrong understanding of the political system in the DPRK, though belatedly.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will counter the U.S. hostile policy towards it with practical toughest actions.

articles.title: S. Korean Youth and Students Condemn Treason of S. Korean Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean Youth and Students Condemn Treason of S. Korean Regime 
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration released a statement titled "Replace Armistice Agreement with peace treaty and repeal the south Korea-Japan military agreement" on July 27.
					 The statement denounced the authorities for defying the long-cherished desire of the nation, driving the situation to the brink of a war through military maneuvers to invade the north and resorting to the dangerous and humiliating diplomacy in secrecy to conclude a military agreement with Japan.
					
					 It expressed towering anger at the Lee Myung Bak's regime which went brazen-faced enough to say without hesitation that "unification is near at hand" while committing treacherous actions inside and outside.
					
					 It urged the authorities to opt for warming the ties with the north in the spirit of the south-north joint declarations and contribute to replacing the Armistice Agreement by peace treaty, though belatedly.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Slam U.S. and S. Korean Traitors' Attempted Terrorism against DPRK
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Slam U.S. and S. Korea for Attempted Terrorism against DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements in denunciation of the heinous state-sponsored politically-motivated terrorism attempted by the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime to hurt the supreme dignity of the DPRK.
					 Pae Jun Ryol, director of the international relations and reunification department of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, said it is an utterly unpardonable thrice-cursed crime that the U.S. and the south Korean Lee Myung Bak group of traitors dared defame the dignity of the supreme leadership in the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean youth and students in Japan will smash the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the forces kowtowing to them by closely uniting around the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, he added.
					
					 Jong Jong Sun, director of the international relations department of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, stressed the need to eternally hold in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as the sun of the nation and make dynamic efforts to certainly lay a springboard for ushering in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Ri Tong Il, director of the international relations and reunification department of the Kyoto Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, underlined the need to foil every vicious move of the enemies, being always vigilant against them.
					
					 Ri Jun Sik, director of the general affairs department of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, said the U.S. and the Lee group of traitors should know that they can never break down the single-minded unity of the people in the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Bangladeshi Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Bangladeshi Organization
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea carried the detailed gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" in its bulletin on July 25.
					 The work made public on August 4, 1997 deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for national reunification.
					
					 It formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme for great national unity and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification. 
					
					 The work also indicates tasks and ways for reunifying the country on the basis of the three charters.

articles.title: Exploits Performed by Kim Il Sung for War Victory Lauded by Mexican Organization
articles.content:
Exploits Performed by Kim Il Sung for War Victory Lauded by Mexican Organization
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism published a bulletin under the title of "President Kim Il Sung who defeated two imperialisms in one generation" on July 25 on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The bulletin cited facts to prove that Kim Il Sung's outstanding military wisdom and unique strategies and tactics and combat methods were a deciding factor of victory in the war in which the young DPRK and its people beat back the U.S. imperialists, the boss of world imperialism, who boasted of their numerical and technological superiority.
					
					 Kim Il Sung defeated Japanese imperialism, liberated Korea and beat back the aggression by the U.S-led imperialist allied forces, protecting the sovereignty of the DPRK, the bulletin said.
					
					 It sincerely hoped the army and people of the DPRK would glorify the exploits performed by the President for the victory in the war, single-mindedly united around Marshal Kim Jong Un, another brilliant commander.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Switzerland
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Switzerland 
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea held a seminar on July 22 to mark the 15th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification". 
					 Reporter and speakers including Martin Lotscher, chairman of the study group, praised the undying feats performed by Kim Jong Il for the reunification of Korea. 
					
					 They recalled that Kim Jong Il formulated the Three Principles of National Reunification, the Ten-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo laid down by President Kim Il Sung as the Three Charters for National Reunification and comprehensively clarified the principled matters and ways for achieving national reunification. 
					
					 They expressed firm belief that the Korean people would surely achieve national reunification by frustrating all the moves of the anti-reunification forces including the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 They vowed to intensify the movement for supporting the Korean people's drive for building a thriving nation and their cause of national reunification in the future, too.

articles.title: Russian Political Party Denounces U.S. Provocations against DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Political Party Denounces U.S. Provocations against DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks of Russia posted an article titled "On Intensified activities of the U.S. to bring down socialist system in DPRK" on its Internet website. 
					 The article said:
					
					 The All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks denounces such despicable provocations of the U.S. special agencies as infiltrating saboteurs into the DPRK to create social chaos. 
					
					 The moves to destroy sacred statues, symbolic of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, and its grand monuments would backfire. 
					
					 The Korean community would get united closer around the party and the leader. 
					
					 The Korean people's hatred for the world empire's evils and oppression will grow stronger. 
					
					 An ill life, an ill end.
					
					 The U.S. ruling quarters' policy against mankind intended to dominate the world through interference in internal affairs of independent states and bloody armed invasion against them will make them pay a dear price.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Congratulated in Bangladesh, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Congratulated in Bangladesh, Nigeria 
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Bangladesh and Nigeria made public statements and a joint statement on July 22 and 23 congratulating the dear respected Kim Jong Un upon receiving the title of DPRK Marshal. 
					 The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee in its statement said that the awarding of the DPRK Marshal title to Kim Jong Un marked an auspicious event of the Korean nation as it meant the realization of the wishes of the Korean people. 
					
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, who is identical to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, is a peerlessly brilliant commander of Songun, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 We firmly believe that the army and people of the DPRK will achieve great successes in the building of a thriving socialist nation and the struggle for the peaceful reunification of the country under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimjongilism, National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Group for the Study of the Songun Politics, Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy and Group for Self-Reliance Studies made public a joint statement which said:
					
					 The Korean people who have carried on the revolution under the great leaders revered by the world people will dynamically advance along the road of independence, the road of Songun and the road of socialism under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 We will always support the cause of the Korean people. 
					
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association in its statement expressed the firm belief that only victory and glory would be in store for the DPRK under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Chinese Paper Introduces Economic Successes in DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese Paper Introduces Economic Successes in DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The Chinese People's Daily on July 28 carried an article titled "Economic construction in DPRK developing in line with Songun politics" to introduce the DPRK. 
					 It said:
					
					 The DPRK is channeling efforts into economic construction. 
					
					 The people's living standard has further improved under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government. 
					
					 The capital city of Pyongyang is presenting fresh scenery. 
					
					  The brightly-lit Mansudae area lined with new apartment houses showcases very modern architectural beauty. 
					
					 The pleasure ground on Rungna Islet in the middle of the Taedong River consists of Dolphinarium, Wading Pool, Fun Fair, mini golf course, etc. 
					
					 The Ryugyong Health Complex and the People's Open-Air Ice Rink nearing their completion will provide a lot of convenience to public entertainment. 
					
					 Noting that local areas in the DPRK have also undergone changes beyond recognition and successes have been made in economic construction, the daily continued: 
					
					 The DPRK has reiterated its invariable will to stick to the Songun politics while vigorously pushing forward economic construction. 
					
					 These days the DPRK has repeatedly criticized the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, its stance remaining steadfast.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to DPRK Mission in Hong Kong, China
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to DPRK Mission in Hong Kong, China
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The director general of the Golden Trip Travel Service Co. Ltd., Hong Kong, China and the chairperson of the Emperor Group of Hong Kong, China sent floral baskets to the DPRK mission in Hong Kong of China on July 26 on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Inaugurada la funcion "Arirang" de ultima version
articles.content:
Inaugurada la funcion "Arirang" de ultima version
						
Pyongyang, 2 de agosto (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia primero por la noche en el capitalino Estadio Primero de Mayo, enclavado en el pintoresco islote Rungna, la ultima version de "Arirang", funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva laureada con el Premio Kim Il Sung.
					El colectivo de creacion renovo el contenido de la obra con las piezas presentadoras del impetu indoblegable de todos los militares y civiles coreanos, que enaltecieron a los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu y luchan tenazmente por la victoria final de la Corea prospera siguiendo a la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, y las otras referentes al aspecto orgulloso de Corea que se transforma cada dia.
					
					Disfrutaron el espectaculo Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop y otros funcionarios de entidades de masas, ministerios e instituciones centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC, los trabajadores capitalinos, los compatriotas residentes en ultramar y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					El ministro de Cultura Hong Kwang Sun pronuncio la palabra de inauguracion.
					
					Cuando comenzaron a repercutir las canciones "La fortuna de Corea" y "Que prospere la epoca del Partido del Trabajo", se inscribieron sucesivamente en la pizarra humana las oraciones como "Rendimos maximo homenaje al camarada Kim Il Sung y al camarada Kim Jong Il", "Maxima gloria al estimado camarada Kim Jong Un", "Presidente y Dirigente son eterno Sol del Juche", "!Viva el General Insigne     Kim Jong Un!", etc. y entraron en accion las oleadas de bailarines.
					
					Los participantes alabaron fervientemente la vida revolucionaria y hazanas de Kim Il Sung y         Kim Jong Il quienes levantaron en este territorio la potencia socialista independiente, autarquica y autodefensiva, manifestaron a todo el mundo la dignidad y el poderio nacional y glorificaron la centuria de la Corea del Juche como la orgullosa de grandes cambios nacionales.
					
					La funcion arranco fuertes aplausos del publico por la combinacion perfecta de la musica, danza, gimnasia y circo con fuerte matiz nacional, la pizarra humana, los dispositivos de escenografia, aparatos de iluminacion electrica y efectos del laser.

articles.title: Wang Jiarui visita el Pabellon de Armamentos del EPC y otros lugares
articles.content:
Wang Jiarui visita el Pabellon de Armamentos del EPC y otros lugares
						
Pyongyang, 2 de agosto (ACNC) -- La delegacion del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China encabezada por su titular, Wang Jiarui, visito el dia 2 el Pabellon de Armamentos del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					  Ante todo, los huespedes colocaron un cesto de flores en nombre de la delegacion ante la estatua de bronce del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il erguida en el pabellon y le rindieron homenaje postumo.
					
					  Escuchando las explicaciones de las inmortales hazanas realizadas por los grandes hombres del monte Paektu en la fundacion y fortalecimiento de la poderosa industria para la defensa nacional de Corea, pasaron revista a diversas armas y equipos tecnicos de combate hechos en las fabricas de la rama de Corea y estuvieron en el campo de exposicion al aire libre.
					
					Wang Jiarui escribio en el libro de visitas que rinde homenaje al EPC que defiende firmemente las gloriosas tradiciones revolucionarias y la paz.
					
					Ademas, la delegacion china recorrio el Almacen para Ninos y las viviendas de la avenida Changjon.

articles.title: Tendra lugar 2a Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason
articles.content:
Tendra lugar 2a Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason
						
Pyongyang, 2 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tendra lugar del dia 20 al 23 del mes en curso la II Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason con la participacion de las companias de varios paises y regiones incluyendo la RPDC, China, Rusia, Francia, Suiza, Australia, el Checo y Taipei de China.
					Se exhibiran en la ocasion las instalaciones mecanicas, los productos electricos y electronicos, los medios de transporte, las mercancias de industria ligera y los medicamentos, etc.
					
					La exhibicion contribuira a desarrollar las cooperaciones y el intercambio entre los paises y regiones en los dominios del comercio, la economia la ciencia y la tecnica. 
					
					Kim Sun Hui (46 anos de edad), jefa de seccion de la agencia de exposiciones de Rason, dijo a la ACNC que estan programadas durante la exhibicion varias labores como el encuentro de explicacion sobre inversiones, las consultas y la visita a las companias en la zona economico-comercial de Rason.
					
					La primera exhibicion se efectuo en agosto del 100 (2011) de la Era Juche.

articles.title: Rim Jong Sim obtiene medalla de oro en los juegos olimpicos
articles.content:
Rim Jong Sim obtiene medalla de oro en los juegos olimpicos
						
Pyongyang, 2 de agosto (ACNC) -- La pesista coreana Rim Jong Sim ocupo el primer lugar en la division de 69kg del levantamiento de pesas (f) efectuada la vispera en los 30o Juegos Olimpicos al levantar 115kg en arranque y 146kg en envion, en un total de 261kg.
